授業目的: The purpose of this course is for students to learn business fundamentals using English through situational practice, evaluation of information, and creation of new ideas
到達目標:
By the end of the course students will be better able to:
a) Remember and understand main ideas and details from readings and video content through summaries, discussions, and connections
b) Synthesize information and concepts to create new ideas through charts, diagrams, videos, and inventions
c) Analyze and evaluate information and data providing comparisons, explanations, inferences, critiques, and recommendations using discourse markers and business vocabulary
d) Communicate through the understanding and use of gestures, eye contact and tone of voice while applying business concepts and vocabulary
特記事項: 本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。 The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
授業の概要・背景:
Career English is designed to develop confident, fluent students who can successfully communicate in increasingly competitive, complex, and globalized business environments. It provides students with specific tools to accomplish strategic business goals, that will help advance their career when seeking employment, in Japan or abroad.

In this class, emphasis will be placed on organizational strategies, negotiation strategies, Multi-media presentations in business contexts, and face-to-face interaction, as well as discuss case studies and apply critical thinking skills with the relevant professional language. Students also have the opportunity to develop a new product or service as well produce a professional western style business resume, and finally participate in a job interview.
授業方法:
This course will use a variety of learning activities ranging from lectures, seminars, discussions, presentations, pair work, and group work.
Classes are conducted face-to-face in the classroom. The online class participants will receive online simultaneous interactive delivery during class time.
